name: The Grim Reaper's Commission
description:
The Grim Reaper's Commission is vampire survivor - like (Not sure of the official genre name) action game with more control over your powers.

Made in 8 Days as a part of the Virtus Game Jam

Dev Log Playlist:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLy_z0JfyB50cTCSjMFx9yRi0tZBhsEYK_

WASD - To Move

1,2,3 - Use Abilities

Game Jam Notes

For the 4 elements theme, I decided that the drinks would be the four elements that the player will engage with in order to create their build. Each customer will allow the player to have the option to enhance the drink bring made. 

The Grim Reaper is tasked with collecting the souls of the deceased. However, in order to increase your power, you must also engage in a little bit of commerce on the side. Using the items you collect from the mortal world, you must craft and sell various goods in order to earn power

Power comes with risks, and you may find yourself weakened by these mortal souls. It will help if you become more efficient at collecting souls in order to ensure the Grim Reaper will be strong enough to continue collecting souls

You Have 5 Nights to Prove your worth
